modName: How to apply any custom NPC's face to your character with Racemenu 3.0
summary: Very quick and easy tutorial for anyone :)
descriptionHtml:
[youtube]MGpnugyCOyk[/youtube]
[url=http://youtu.be/w3eojk-XAwg]http://youtu.be/MGpnugyCOyk[/url]

[b][color=#ead1dc][size=4]Description[/size][/color][/b]
Here's my tutorial on how to apply any NPC's face to your character with Racemenu 3.0 or higher.
I tried to give you the steps as simple as possible :)
If this helped, please endorse :P


[color=#ead1dc][size=4][b]Notes[/b][/size][/color]
Song used
-Celldweller - Against the Tide(instrumental)

Program used
-Sony Vegas 13
-Action!
-Fraps
